mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, user_id, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_ORIGINAL_img, BOARD_RENAME_img, BOARD_DATE,BOARD_READCOUNT FROM (select * from board order by board_no desc)) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into board (board_no, user_id, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_readcount, board_original_img, board_rename_img) values ((select max(board_no) + 1 from board), #{user_id}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, sysdate, 0, #{board_original_img}, #{board_rename_img})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_READCOUNT FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_READCOUNT DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= 1 AND RNUM <= 5
